DOC.criteria: Patients whose treatment provide Centre Oscar Lambret With corpus uteri adenocarcinoma , metastatic , treat : Surgery observation without complementary treatment Or surgery adjuvant radiotherapy Or Surgery curietherapy vaginal dome With cervix carcinoma , stade IA2 IIB proximal , treat : External radiochemotherapy curietherapy Or surgery Or presurgical curietherapy surgery Age > 18 year
